event.title: Fellowship Meeting Franconia in Bamberg, Germany

body.p:
On Saturday, July 11 at 7:00 pm, the local FSFE group in Franconia will meet again. The Fellowship meeting will take place in Bamberg's Hackerspace "Backspace" which is conveniently located near the train station and the downtown area, Spiegelgraben 41. All friends of Free Software are welcome to join us!
.
